channel.title: David Wilks
channel.description: Recent news about David Wilks, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Kootenay News Advertiser
item.description:
Funding for safety improvement at Canadian Rockies International Airport
David Wilks, Member of Parliament for Kootenay—Columbia, on behalf of the Honourable Lisa Raitt, Minister of Transport, today announced funding for an important safety improvement project at the Canadian Rockies International Airport. The Canadian Rockies International Airport is receiving $33,715 through the ... “The Canadian Rockies International Airport is a vital gateway for local residents, businesses, trade and tourism,” said MP Wilks. “This funding will enhance the safety of all those who use this airport, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cranbrook Daily Townsman
item.description:
Feds deliver funding for airport safety
Left to right: Cranbrook Councillor Sharon Cross, CRIA Managing Director Tristen Chernove, Kootenay-Columbia MP David Wilks, Cranbrook Mayor Wayne Stetski, Cranbrook Councillor Gerry Warner. Courtesy Chris Zettel/City of Cranbrook. Share this story.

item.title: Mentioned by Canada NewsWire (press release)
item.description:
Government of Canada invests in safety at Canadian Rockies International Airport
CRANBROOK, BC, July 18, 2013 /CNW/ - David Wilks, Member of Parliament for Kootenay—Columbia, on behalf of the Honourable Lisa Raitt, Minister of Transport, today announced funding for an important safety improvement project at the Canadian Rockies International Airport. The Canadian Rockies International Airport is ... "The Canadian Rockies International Airport is a vital gateway for local residents, businesses, trade and tourism," said MP Wilks. "This funding will enhance the safety of all those who use ...

item.description:

David Wilks, Member of Parliament for Kootenay—Columbia, on behalf of the Honourable Lisa Raitt, Minister of Transport, on July 18 announced funding for an important safety improvement project at the Canadian Rockies International Airport. item.title: Mentioned by Canada NewsWire (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory - Government of Canada
Media Advisory - Government of Canada. OTTAWA, July 16, 2013 /CNW/ - David Wilks, Member of Parliament for Kootenay—Columbia, on behalf of the Honourable Lisa Raitt, Minister of Transport, will be joined by Wayne Stetski, Mayor of Cranbrook, to announce Government of Canada support for the Canadian Rockies International Airport. MP Wilks and Mr. Stetski will be available for a photo opportunity and to answer questions from the media following the announcement. Please note that all details are subject to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cranbrook Daily Townsman
item.description:
Kootenay Columbia MP flies to Vancouver to debate ban on coal
When a motion to symbolically ban storage and shipment of coal through the City of Vancouver was up for debate, Kootenay Columbia MP David Wilks hopped on a plane to give his constituents' perspective. The amendment passed at the July 9 meeting, but ...
